description:
PRICE REDUCED 30% - 
Arguably, one of the best desk-side Exhibition apps!  Your Photo Show - a superb Exhibition app from CES Associates, developers of Desk Assistant Pro & other fine HP/Palm apps.  

When you're busy and your TouchPad is just sitting there being charged, let it display your precious photos.  Pick which ones you want to put on display.  How long should they be displayed before changing?  Show them in order or randomly?  You decide.  And yes, you can stop the show on any photo, pinch and zoom it, swipe it back and forth for the previous or next. Landscape or portrait. You're in charge! 

Background music?  If you want. Pick from any of your music. And again.  You decide if you want them played in order or randomly - or not at all! Pause it, skip to next or previous.  Again, you're in charge.

Maybe just music and no photos?  You decide!

While you're at it you can display the current weather and the next few days along the top ... but only if you want to!

And there's still another decision to make.  You can display the stock market ticker running along the bottom - the major indices and any of your investments that you decide to add. Keep an eye on them... but only if you want!! Yeah, you guessed it. You have to decide!

For more details, see a copy of the Help file at http://www.mysite.verizon.net/charlie.santos/cesassociates
versionNote:
Fixed problem where sometime ticker does not start.
 
Put up Spinner while waiting for stock data.
